definition: Qincheng Prison, maximum-security prison located about 30 km north of central Beijing, whose inmates include former high-level officials convicted of corruption

sentences.english: The open of prison affairs is called the sunlight project in our country's prison system.
sentences.chinese: 獄務公開被譽爲我國監獄系統的陽光工程。

sentences.english: Inspired by a cross between a fusebox and a prison.
sentences.chinese: 那靈感是來自保險絲盒與監獄的雜交麼。

sentences.english: Not very much. You are a turnkey at the Conciergerie?
sentences.chinese: 要你乾的並不太多。你在附屬監獄管牢房麼？

sentences.english: You letter don't trust me now you the pass enter jug inside?
sentences.chinese: 你信不信我現在就把你關進監獄裏面？

sentences.english: He was put into prison for robbing the bank.
sentences.chinese: 他因搶銀行而被投入了監獄。

sentences.english: And he is in prison waiting to be executed. So, he’s gonna be killed; he’s hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 他在監獄裏等着行刑，很絕望。

sentences.english: More guards, carrying six wooden coffins, made their way to a wall on the prison's seaward side.
sentences.chinese: 又有幾個守衛扛着六具棺木朝監獄靠海的一面牆走去。

sentences.english: The Prison University Project has expanded under Ms. Lewen's leadership.
sentences.chinese: 在盧恩女士的領導下，這個監獄大學項目不斷擴展。

sentences.english: Then the French came up with semi-private jails, in which the state employs only the guards;
sentences.chinese: 之後法國開始出現半私立監獄，即僅由國家僱用守衛。

sentences.english: Her son was sent to the big house for stealing classified papers.
sentences.chinese: 她的兒子因爲盜竊歸好類的文件而被送進了監獄。

sentences.english: More than five prisoners have escaped from this prison.
sentences.chinese: 已經有五個以上囚犯從這個監獄逃掉了。

sentences.english: I strongly believe that the most horrible prison has no ruthless walls and windows.
sentences.chinese: 我確實相信，世界上最恐怖的監獄並沒有鐵窗和圍牆。

sentences.english: Prison, she decided, would be where she could finally grieve her father.
sentences.chinese: 她知道，監獄將是她最終令她父親傷心的地方。

sentences.english: What did we do in prison?
sentences.chinese: 我們在監獄裏做了什麼呢？

sentences.english: Her testimony helped put several of the perpetrators behind bars.
sentences.chinese: 她的證詞將幾個罪犯送進了監獄。

definition: in those days/then/in those years/during that time
to extend as long as/to lengthen out to
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
